title: SOLD: Fred Merkle, throwing, SGC 4 VG-EX, centered...

posts.post_title: SOLD: Fred Merkle, throwing, SGC 4 VG-EX, centered...
posts.post_content:
Nicely centered card of Merkle. The registration is very nice as well. The price is $SOLD, net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S. Tax free. 

I also have T206s of Fred Clarke (portrait) and Vic Willis (throwing) for sale if interested.
